tool_description: Specialized tool for extracting and preprocessing text content from various document formats with advanced text processing capabilities.

file_path.description: Path to the document file for text extraction

preserve_formatting.description: Whether to preserve original formatting marks

extract_tables.description: Whether to extract and structure table content

extract_footnotes.description: Whether to extract footnotes and references

error_messages: Unsupported document format: The file format is not supported for text extraction
Encrypted document: Cannot extract text from password-protected or encrypted documents
Corrupted document: Document structure is corrupted and cannot be processed
Empty document: No extractable text content found in the document
usage: Provide file_path and configure text extraction options based on whether you need formatted content, tables, footnotes, or cleaned text output.

word_count.description: Total number of words in extracted text

table_data.description: Extracted table content in structured format

footnotes.description: Array of extracted footnotes and references
